author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: The release of Vue.js 2.5.0 has brought server-side rendering support to non-Node.js environments including PHP. In this article, I'll go through the steps of setting up a Vue server-rendered app using Laravel and V8Js
name: Server-Side Rendering With Laravel & Vue.js 2.5
